title: Garnets ghost, addressing to the Jesuits, met in private Caball, just after the murther of Sir Edmund-Bury Godfrey written by the author of The satyr against virtue (not yet printed).
author: Oldham, John, 1653-1683.
notes: Imprint suggested by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
The author'a first satyr upon the Jesuits. - NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
